name: By The Fire (znncvl)
description:
A survival game that is totally not inspired by a film made in 1969 that I watched in high school.

HOW TO PLAY

Collect wood to keep the flame alive but don't stay in the cold too much or you will die, and keep an eye out you never know if someone want's to steal your flame.

CONTROLS

A and D or left and right arrow keys to move.

E to throw wood at enemies

Space bar to jump.

ATTRIBUTIONS

Font
https://www.1001fonts.com/users/fontsforflash/
